ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: As Storm Shadow and Snake-Eyes go after the Blue Ninjas, trouble continues in Benzheen as the Joes and former Oktober Guard square off vs. the invading H.I.S.S. tanks from the next country. Meanwhile, Cobra Commander buries Billy and swears vengeance vs. the Blue Ninjas, and wishes to procure their tech for his own. Destro asks Baroness if she felt anything for Billy while he was alive, but she says no. The H.I.S.S. tanks are defeated, but both the Joes and Guard lose their own tanks as the new governing party takes control, having overthrown the Emir.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:58:02. [CVDB310970] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:21. [Issue ID 904813]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Gary Erskine,Herb Trimpe,James Brown (J. Brown),Larry Hama,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Col. Chikatilo],Dr. Mindbender,Benzheen citizens,Wildcard,Oktober guard (former) [Daina,Steeler,Malyenkiy,Storm Shadow,G.I. Joe [Snake-Eyes,Destro,Cobra [Cobra Commander,Crimson Guard],Cover Girl,Cross Country],Blue Ninja robot,Baroness
